io.github.austindewitt13.rot.viewmodel

Class AlarmViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
        • io.github.austindewitt13.rot.viewmodel.AlarmViewModel

  • public class AlarmViewModel
extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
    This initializes a LiveData List of Alarms, adds an Alarm, and removes an Alarm from the AlarmEventDatabase.
